meanings.definition: To try to do something again after failing the first time.
meanings.sent1: After failing to bake a cake, she decided to reattempt the recipe.
meanings.sent2: He will reattempt the math problem to get the correct answer.
meanings.sent3: The magician's reattempt at pulling a rabbit out of the hat was successful this time.
meanings.sent4: She reattempted to climb the mountain, determined to reach the summit.
meanings.sent5: The student's reattempt at passing the test paid off with a higher score.
